title: My Quarto Book
text:
This is a sample Quarto book.
To learn more about Quarto books visit Quarto website.

title: 1  Setup
text:
If you want to get a good introduction into it, read my first article of the series (Gollnick (2022)).




Gollnick, Bert. 2022. “Create Interactive Reports with Python.” https://towardsdev.com/create-interactive-reports-with-quarto-d8175538a57d.

title: 2  Python vs. R
text:
PythonR


This is sample Python code directly evaluated by Quarto.


Code
# python code
a = 1 
a


1




And here is the corresponding R code.


Code
# R code
my_var <- 2
my_var


[1] 2

title: References
text:
quarto install tool tinytex
Afterwards you need to restart your system.


Gollnick, Bert. 2022. “Create Interactive Reports with
Python.” https://towardsdev.com/create-interactive-reports-with-quarto-d8175538a57d.
